channel.title: Projects on Jason Roelofs
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Jason Roelofs

item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: My development environment! Contains configurations for bash, my prompt, git, and vim.

item.title: Rice
item.description: Ruby Interface for C++ Extensions. Expose your C++ classes to Ruby through a simple DSL.

item.title: rbgccxml
item.description: Ruby library to parse and query C++ header files using CastXML (previously named GCCXML).

item.title: rb++
item.description: Combines rbgccxml and rice to automatically generate Ruby extensions from C++ code.

item.title: Raidit
item.description: Building an MMO focused calendar tool for scheduling player, guild, or server events as an experiment in applying different patterns to Rails web-app development. See the Designing a Rails Application series for the accompaning articles.

item.title: SimpleAWS
item.description: Deprecated Small, simple, and forward compatible AWS communication library.
